description: This file configures the Angular application's core setup, including routing, zone change detection, and client hydration features.

methods.name: provideZoneChangeDetection
methods.description: Configures Angular's zone change detection with event coalescing.

methods.name: provideRouter
methods.description: Sets up routing for the Angular application with defined routes.

methods.name: provideClientHydration
methods.description: Enables client-side hydration with event replay to optimize server-side rendered applications.

methods.name: withEventReplay
methods.description: Configures event replay mechanism for hydration.
